title: Project Initiation Meeting
description: Establish project goals, timelines, and team roles.

title: Requirements Gathering & Analysis
description: Gather and analyze the library's functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Design Immutable Data Structure Library Architecture
description: Develop the architecture and design patterns for the data structure library.

title: Implement Persistent Immutable Data Structures
description: Implement each data structure according to the design.
dependencies: Design Immutable Data Structure Library Architecture

title: Perform Code Review & Quality Assurance Testing
description: Review the implemented data structures for correctness, efficiency, and compatibility with functional programming paradigms.

title: Optimize Data Structure Implementations (if necessary)
description: Optimize the data structure implementations for performance and memory usage.
dependencies: Perform Code Review & Quality Assurance Testing

title: Document the Immutable Data Structure Library
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the library, including usage examples and API references.

title: Prepare Library for Public Release
description: Package and prepare the library for public release, including versioning, documentation updates, and artifact builds.
dependencies: Document the Immutable Data Structure Library
